_header: The corn fro chaff is departed

CamPem265.Transcription:
Þe korn fro chaf is departudÞe quicnesse of crowynges is
                    aperseiuudon hy he crowes vp streitzaboutun euene and vp
                    ritz
CamPem265.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Pembroke
                College, Cambridge.
